sourcesContent:
import React, {Fragment,useEffect,useState} from 'react' const QuizOver = React.forwardRef((props, ref) => { const { levelName, score, maxQuestions, quizLevel, percent, } = props; const [asked, setasked] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { setasked(ref.current) }, [ref]) const averageGrade= maxQuestions / 2 const decision = score > averageGrade ? (
{ quizLevel < levelName.length ? (

Bravo passer au niveau suivant!

 ) : (

Bravo,rien a dire vous etes un vrais fans!!

 ) }
Reussite : {percent}%
Note : {score}/{maxQuestions}
) : (

Vous avez echoué !

Reussite : {percent}%
Note : {score}/{maxQuestions}
) const questionAnswerd = asked.map((options)=>{ return( {options.question } {options.answer } ) }) return ( {decision}

les reponses aux questions posées :

{questionAnswerd}
Questions Réponses Infos
) }) export default React.memo(QuizOver)
